profiles:
Summary Results-driven customer marketer. Excellent analytical and project management skills with proven success in identifying opportunities for process improvement and reducing execution complexity. Recognized as a motivational manager with the ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive successful, profitable campaigns for both acquisition and retention efforts.  
 
Cross Channel Marketing: Synegrate customer marketing strategy across email, social, and ecommerce. Lead direct response campaigns for mail, TV print, online, and telemarketing. Develop creative materials and scripts. Integrate marketing efforts across all channels and segment customers based on behavior to drive future acquisition efforts and improve customer lifetime value.  
 
Marketing Strategy: Identify opportunities to generate revenue and cut costs. Develop strategic plans to support the vision and growth of organizations. Analyze available competitive intelligence to improve marketing plans. Improve operational efficiencies through process evaluation and data standardization 
 
Marketing Analytics: Build marketing tactics and strategy through analytics. Ensure the utilization of data and intelligence to create sound marketing strategies, anticipate trends and articulate future marketing needs. Develop strategic plans, forecasts and budgets to support cross-channel efforts. 
 
Email Marketing: Develop and execute email streams that drive revenue growth through retention, cross-sells, and up-sells. Design and launch tests that support key hypotheses and deliver actionable learning. Utilize customer insights to produce effective customer segmentation and highly persuasive offers. 
 
Customer Retention and Loyalty: Drive alignment of customer-impacting initiatives throughout marketing strategy. Map customer lifecycle identifying key trigger points in behavior. Develop innovative programs to create loyalty. Identify and measure key retention indicators. Specialties:Customer Marketing, Retention Marketing, Renewal Marketing, Customer Service, Credit & Billing, Direct Response Marketing, Loyalty Marketing, CRM, Acquisition Marketing, Marketing Analytics, Business Development, Consumer Research, Consumer Focus Groups Summary Results-driven customer marketer. Summary •	Over 15 years experience of online/digital work experience, both on the agency and client side, including financial, telecom, retail and media sites 
•	Extensive web analytics and market research experience using both qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Advanced Adobe Site Catalyst, Discover and Data Warehouse user with implementation experience. Also experienced HBX and WebTrends users. 
•	3+ year employee management experience 
•	Experienced in video, audio, mobile and social measurement (crimson hexagon, Radian 6) 
•	Holder of 2 Master’s degrees (Information Studies, Politics) 
•	Recognized Web Analytics thought-leader in the Canadian measurement community: member of the comScore Research Advisory Council, has advised the Canadian Media Fund on how to measure digital media, frequent speaker at eMetrics, member of this year’s Advisory Board. Summary Highly experienced in many aspects of Information Management and Integration. With over 20 years working in BI, Data Warehousing, CRM, MDM he has developed broad and deep knowledge of how to deliver enterprise solutions that deliver business benefit and platforms for growth. He has more specialist technical knowledge around the Oracle BI & Data Warehousing technologies including Engineered Systems.  
 
Excellent understanding of the UK grocery retail market and broad understanding or Retail and CPG in general. Strong ability to engage with people effectively at all levels of an organisation on a personal level as well as being comfortable presenting to larger groups.  
 
Home is in the Yorkshire Dales where you will find him walking, cycling, or more likely running kids to and from their sporting events. Experience Senior Manager Digital & Analytics Accenture September 2014  – Present (1 year) Manchester, United Kingdom Fresh new start in the Digital practice at Accenture. I will be using my background in Data, Integration, Analytics, Oracle and Retail to deliver projects across UK and Ireland. I am very excited to be getting the opportunity to work on a wide range of projects in different organisations using Analytics and BI. The Analytics team within Accenture digital is growing rapidly as we respond to the increasing business demand for new innovative solutions exploiting the latest techniques in Big Data, Analytics, Visualisation, etc. Head of MIS Wm Morrison Supermarkets Plc October 2007  –  September 2014  (7 years) Bradford, United Kingdom Created the first MIS team in Morrisons from scratch to a permanent onshore team of 12 BI/DW professionals split 50:50 between Architecture and run.  
Established near-shore support service with 3rd party for all BI services. 
Established 24x7 remote BI Platform support for Oracle Exadata with Oracle AM&R service. 
Worked with on-shore and off shore delivery teams from multiple vendors to build all elements of the EDW & BI Platform. 
 
Implemented a number of elements coming together to make up a strategic data warehouse and BI platform for Morrisons:-  
Near Real-time Retail ODS, Oracle BI Apps for Finance (GL, AP, AR Procure & Spend), BI Apps for Manufacturing, Oracle Retail Data Model for core retail functions plus bespoke extensions where required.  
Selected and implemented integration using GoldenGate and Oracle Data Integrator. Also used Informatica where it is embedded in the BI apps integration. Information Systems Manager Waitrose November 1995  –  October 2007  (12 years) Held various roles across John Lewis Partnership, principally within Waitrose. Most of these roles were in the area of Business Intelligence, CPM, Data Integration, etc. Spent the final few years running the Information Systems team. This involved developing the data warehouse and BI infrastructure using DB2, DataStage and Business Objects.
